meanings.sent1: Don't be a chump and fall for that trick.
meanings.sent2: He felt like a chump after realizing he had been scammed.
meanings.sent3: The chump believed the email promising a million dollars.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a chump in the game of deception.
meanings.sent5: Being a chump in this situation will only lead to trouble.

meanings.definition: A thick, heavy block of wood.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter used a chump to support the structure.
meanings.sent2: The chump of wood was too heavy to lift alone.
meanings.sent3: He tripped over the chump lying on the ground.
meanings.sent4: The chump of wood stood out among the other materials.
meanings.sent5: The chump served as a sturdy base for the project.

meanings.definition: To hit or strike with the fist.
meanings.sent1: He tried to chump his opponent in the boxing match.
meanings.sent2: She accidentally chumped the table while gesturing.
meanings.sent3: The comedian pretended to chump the invisible enemy.
meanings.sent4: The boxer chumped his way to victory with powerful punches.
meanings.sent5: Chumping the bag helped release some frustration.
